parameters: $gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.We only picked up worthless chatter from two of the transmitters, but the third picked up something quite creepy.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.The one coming from the east side of the mansion.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaDe.I heard something similar, but faint when I was in the kitchen.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiWoOp.What’s going on over there? Some sort of cult activity?");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiWoEx.That was the end of the recording. The transmitter stopped responding after this.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.Or out of batteries… But the other two are still online.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaDe.I don’t know what it could be, but something strange is happening at the mansion.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McSaDe.If Andrea finds out I’m helping you do this, my career is over.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFrEx.I know this is a big risk to you. But we’ll make it worth your effort.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaDe.I’m not going to take bribes. I’m only in this because I want to know what’s going on at the mansion…");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.Kimura is not too keen on the idea of me interfering with… her own operations.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.A highly valuable Rembrandt. The Guild wants it and they are here to steal it…");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McWoEx.But we’re working on it and that’s why you have to stay away from the mansion.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaDe.Holy shit! You’re luring them in? Then why keep guard there?");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.We can’t make it easy. It would be too obvious…");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.You want a good story? Then let us do our job, and you’ll get the scoop after we arrest them.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McFrEx.That’s something you and I are going to figure out together…");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.Just promise me you’re on our side. We’ll give you what you want, you just have to wait.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlDe.Sounds like we’re going to have an interesting interview tonight…");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.Next time you’re in the mansion, replace the broken one with this.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFrEx.We’ll get ready. See you in the studio.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.I’ve been checking the recordings and nothing stood out, but in the last hour we got this.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.There’s something in that room that opens a secret passage.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiWoEx.1Hero… I had a dream last night.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiWoEx.I dreamt of a secret passage. There was an eye and a gargoyle…");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiWoOp.It’s probably just a coincidence… But this is creeping me out.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaOp.What exactly did you see in your dream?");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.Well… There was a group of women… But they were in a shadow… Very hard to see.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaDe.The room was old… Orange-lit from flames, but too dark to make much out.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.I had a similar dream. I don’t think it’s a coincidence.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.What do you think they are hiding?");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.I’ve seen it… There is a room like you describe. Dark, but lit with torches.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McWoEx.You can’t go back there. We’re risking getting caught.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlEx.We won’t get caught. I just want to see this place for myself.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiSaEx.Of course there is! I’m a reporter. I want to know.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnDe.Look… You’re going to have a story soon. Just be patient.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiAnEx.There’s something else going on, and I think you know it.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlDe.We’re very similar, you and I. You know I won't let this go.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaDe.We can’t just go in there and start looking around. Lillian or the lepers will see you.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlDe.You’re smart. Isn’t there a way to sneak around?");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.Lillian’s maid… She’s been helping me spy on her.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McFrEx.She’s good at distraction… Let me talk to her.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.Get her help, 1Hero. There’s something going on under that mansion and I need to know what it is.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlDe.I can’t keep secrets from my producer, 1Hero.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McBaEx.Let’s keep this so-called rift room between us… At least for now.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.See if Lillian’s maid will help us sneak into the mansion.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiBaEx.Nothing’s coming up on the audio. The transmitters have been silent.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFrEx.I’ve been in this room since I left the mansion. If something happens, I’ll let you know.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnDe.I don’t know what the hell they're talking about.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnDe.Why would I trust you with anything?");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlEx.We have the same goal. We both want to know what’s happening at that mansion.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnDe.You just want a story. You’ll step all over the investigation to get it.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiAnEx.You’re not part of the investigation anymore.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiWoEx.1Hero… I’ve been having dreams ever since we went into that secret basement.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnDe.You have no idea what you’re talking about. You’re just having nightmares.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiAnOp.I’m going to find out, one way or another.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnDe.You promised not to visit the mansion again.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiAnEx.You’re not a detective anymore. I’ll do what I have to do.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnDe.You don’t know what you’re getting into.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlDe.And that’s supposed to make me back down?");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "McAnEx.If you go there, you’ll get caught. I’m not helping you this time.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlEx.We’re partners in this, 1Hero. No matter how grumpy you are, you need my help.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFlDe.We’re partners in this, 1Hero. No matter how grumpy you are, you need my help.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "KiFrEx.I want to see what’s in that mansion’s basement.");
$gameVariables.setValue(21, "You can now find this character profile in your album.");
